Winter Reading Club Skokie Public Library Get started

New
Things
In
2016

For this year’s Winter Reading program, we’re challenging ourselves to challenge ourselves, to try new things, and stretch for that better version of you.

Learn how you can sign up, level up, and win prizes this winter.

Sign up

It’s easy to get started. Just come to the library to sign up. You’ll get a level card and can get started.

Sorry, only Skokie residents can sign up for this year’s program.

Level up

To complete the program, you have to “level up.” How do you do that? Complete five of the ten tasks on your level card and you’ve leveled up!

There are three levels in all, but only have to finish level 1 to finish. So, why not go big and do all three?

Win prizes

Finished your level card? Bring it back to the library and drop it off at [PLACE]. You can enter your card in one of several raffle drawing buckets.

Thanks to our sponsors (see below) we have fun prizes to offer like: [PRIZES]
